title: Smokey, Skincare & Jaheim's Hair!
itunes:title: Smokey, Skincare & Jaheim's Hair!
description:
FRI 10/21 - Legendary music icon Smokey Robinson joins The Breakfast Club! He talks about life at 76, his new skincare line, writing over 4,000 songs, today's music scene, how race relations have improved compared to his youth and much, much more! Oh, and a Petty Party started between Jaheim & Charlamagne. Has to do with a hee-haw, you'll see...

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
